title: Leaf Blower
summaries: The Leaf Blower is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that rapidly fires a barrage of leaf projectiles in a semi-randomized spread, which begin swerving slightly after traveling about 15 tiles. The leaves do not pierce enemies. The Leaf Blower has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 (16.67%) chance of being dropped by Plantera.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Its best modifier is Mythical.
(Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Its best modifier is either Masterful for mana conservation or Godly/Demonic for higher damage output. It cannot get the Mythical modifier due to its low mana cost.

statistics.Damage: 48 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 42 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Magic)
statistics.Knockback: 4 (Weak) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 3 (Very weak) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Mana: 5 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 4 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Use time: 7 (Insanely fast) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 8 (Insanely fast) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 6 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 7 GC (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
